sentences.sCn: 这次爆炸把大楼炸成一片废墟。

sentences.sContent: ...Despite its failure to shatter the glass ceiling...

synos.tran: 粉碎；打碎；破坏；破掉；使散开

words.tran: 破碎的；令人震惊的；令人极度疲劳的
破碎；震裂；脱落现象；粉碎理论
打碎；削弱；使震惊（shatter的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to break suddenly into very small pieces, or to make something break in this way

trans.tranCn: 使粉碎，砸碎；使破灭；使震惊
trans.tranOther: to break suddenly into very small pieces, or to make something break in this way
